name: PlatformerTutorial
description:
Simple platformer tutorial made for Game Heads 2020.  Not a full game and not tuned to be playable, but to demonstrate various platformer tunables.  I might upload a version with a tuning UI later.

GitHub page - https://github.com/Impossible/PlatformerTutoria

Uses assets from AdamAtomic

  • Caves of gallet - https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas
  • Abandonauts - https://adamatomic.itch.io/abandonauts
